title: ekkAlamum ninaivAi
sahitya:
ekkAlattilum ninaivAi nI iyalAnmA enavE


anupallavi

  duhkkAlayamAna ulagil tuDikkum Ashait-taDippai aDakki


caraNam    arai noDiyil ulagai azhikkum aNu guNDar yugattil AghAyad-dUsiyAgap-
pOkkum vaiyagattil viraivilE kAlattEr koNDEghum viyan perum
ihattil vibattaiyellAm kaDandu shAnta sukhattinai anubhavikka manamE
